Um breve resumo do jogo:

Deathmatch Classic, como diz o nome, é um título de multiplayer deathmatch clássico do estilo Quake - uma vez que Half-Life foi desenvolvido sob base da engine do Quake, porém, rebatizada de GoldSrc - trazendo então o cenário meio lovecraftiano do Quake e também as armas que lembram o armamento do clássico título da id Software - o único diferencial é que o machado do Ranger (protagonista do Quake) foi substituído pelo tradicional pé-de-cabra do HL.

Como sempre, as partidas são bem frenéticas - não espere nenhuma novidade por se tratar de um deathmatch, ou seja, todos contra todos, seja entre os jogadores ou bots em alguns servidores. Quem gosta de um clássico deathmatch frenético old-school, esse é um deles.
Very fun, sadly it's somewhat abandoned nowadays

Рецепт дораяки (Толстых блинов с начинкой):

Мука - 130 г

Яйцо - 2 шт.

Сахар - 80 г

Мед - 20 г

Вода - 50 мл

Разрыхлитель - 1 чайная ложка

Для обжаривания:
Растительное масло - 1 столовая ложка.

Взял этот рецепт с рандомного сайте, главное не обдристаться)
good game but dead.
da

If i'm not mistaken Deathmatch Classic is supposed to be somewhat similar to the old Quake games. Great! Everyone always praises the Quake games and i never really managed to get into them but maybe with this game i could figure out what everyone loved so much. Unfortunately this game is basically dead. Other then AI there isn't many people to play against. Most of the servers are really high ping for me anyways so the servers i can enter are limited. Even if i could join each and every server without having to worry about ping it wouldn't mean anything because only a handful of servers actually have bots in it. The others are just empty. So thats kind of sad but well is the game any good? I mean... Its not bad but its nothing awesome either. Imagine Half Life like the original except its a bit faster, you are stuck in an arena of some sort and you run around collecting weapons and ammo and shooting other players in the face. Its really meh.

+A lot of weapons. Rocket launchers, shotguns, a crowbar, double barrel shotgun, some weird double barreled machine gun thing that fires really slow bullets for some reason?
+The graphics and sounds are alright. Gameplay is pretty fun. Its like a slightly sped up Half Life. I think this is supposed to be somehow connected to the old Quake games but i never really played those so i wouldn't know. Gameplay is basically run around, collect things like armor, weapons, ammo and health and kill enemies. As the name suggests its a Deathmatch game so everyone fights for themselves. It can get pretty chaotic.
+Most of the weapons suck and feel absolutely useless except for the rocket launcher. The rocket launcher is simply awesome. It does a shit ton of damage, you can boost yourself with it kind of like a rocket jump from Team Fortress 2 that concept probably originated in these older games but the first time i ever did rocket jumping was in TF2 so thats the one i'll use as reference. But yeah the rocket launcher does a lot of damage, can boost you and its incredibly fun to use. Rockets travel somewhat slowly so you need to kind of predict where your enemy will be by the time the rocket reaches him. That depends on range too of course you can just point blank fire these things too. Either way it feels awesome once you hit someone directly with a rocket from distance. The only downside would be its incredibly easy to kill yourself with it and it doesn't have enough ammo. Either way best gun. Every other gun is absolutely useless in comparison.

+/- maps are meh. Nothing awesome, nothing awful.

-Can't join most servers because of my high ping.
-Basically dead player base.
-Explosives are UNFAIRLY powerful. You really don't need any other weapon. A lot of health, armor and the rocket launcher with a lot of ammo is all you need. Now against real players maybe this won't work so well but i could only play in a single server against AI and i could kick their ass with this setup pretty realiably. If i can do it then you definitely can. Now on the bright side using the rocket launcher is incredibly fun as i said previously. However its so OP to the point where every other gun is just... not needed. Why would you use anything else? Just find where this thing spawns, find where its ammo spawns, find where the health and armor packs are and keep going between these places. Its just such a good weapon that everything else becomes absolutely useless against it. The only weapon that could somewhat counter the rocket launcher was some sort of grenade launcher. Using that thing was harder but it still fired an explosive. I think that might be the issue. Explosives are too powerful. Rocket launcher or grenade launcher doesn't matter. The only reason the rocket launcher is superior is because i had an easier time finding it and ammo for it and it was easier to use. Its just too OP man.

Its not necessarily a bad game its just really meh. There is nothing to really praise but that doesn't mean its shit. It can be fun. I just think the rocket launcher is too OP and i have like 2 servers that i can play on. Every other server either has too high ping for me or has no players and no AI in it for me to fight against. This really isn't a game you need. If you get this from the Valve Complete Pack then great but on its own its really not a game you should purchase. If it had more players and better servers that i could connect to then i would probably give this a thumbs up.

Deathmatch Classic to całkiem przyjemna i szybka gra podobna całkiem do gry Quake (oszczędzę porównania ponieważ dotychczas w niego nie grałem a widziałem co najwyżej filmiki na YouTube). Nie jest droga, ale może odstraszać ilością graczy która często jest zerowa. Na wielu serwerach jednak można napotkać boty więc jest do kogo strzelać. Mapy są całkiem fajnie zbudowane, a ilość gnatów jest zadowalająca. Ogółem mogę tą grę polecić do pogrania chociażby ze znajomymi, a na aktualnej (02.07.2022) promocji warto nabyć Valve Complete Pack która zawiera tą grę, tym bardziej że jest tańsza niż zakup CS-a i Half Life-a razem, a zawiera prawie wszystkie gry Valve (poza HL Alyx).

[h1]Comentario Analítico: "Deathmatch Classic"[/h1]

Inspirado en clásicos de ID Software y cuyas similitudes con Quake se vuelven inmediatamente notorias, Deathmach Classic es uno de los tantos multijugadores online clásicos de Valve que agarra modelos e ideas de Half-Life y las adapta a modo de homenaje.

Ahora mismo cuenta con 6 jugadores dentro y varios servidores abiertos, algunos con bots (Con una IA increíblemente básica) y algún que otro mod extraño. Viví varios momentos de mucha actividad en otros clásicos multijugadores de Valve, pero no recuerdo si alguna vez estuve en un servidor muy activo de éste.

No confundir con el modo Deathmatch que incluía el propio Half-Life 1, que aún cuenta con una cantidad pequeña pero sorprendente de jugadores activos.

[b]¿En conclusión?[/b] Nada del otro mundo. Quake y el Deathmatch de Half-Life 1 son más interesantes.

blatant copy of Open Fortress, an in-development (thought currently the code is closed until a reverse engineering project is done) open source mod originally created by KaydemonLP. The aim of this mod is to add Deathmatch and other gamemodes to TF2. Its current lead developer is Sir Matrix.

The mod is bit of a throwback to Quake Team Fortress or Quake itself, Doom, Half-life Deatmatch, and Team Fortress Clas

这款20多年前的多人死斗游戏玩起来特别像《Quake》，原因就是这游戏本质就是对id的《Quake》的翻版，不光玩法，连火箭跳也都搬过去了，但移动速度要明显慢，近战武器换成了撬棍。这游戏目前完全鬼服，只能打打Bot，不光现在，这游戏很早就鬼服了，听说玩家峰值是28人。刚推出的时候这游戏是免费的，但在Steam上却收费，我是从大包合集里买的，价格极低，但是不咋能玩，现在只为消除未测评。

Deathmatch Classic именно в этой игре Valve цитирует игры от id software даа Deathmatch Classic это смесь Quake и Half-Life даа игра на данный момент мертва сервера полностью пустые но а так вечером могут появится люди Я видел человека 2 играли и это хоть какой-то актив в этой игре а так игра очень отличная Я рекомендую её сыграть всем и кстати многие сервера требуют от игрока установить такую модификацию как DMC Pro которая включает в себя звуковое сопровождение в стиле Quake, пользовательские карты, режим Захват флага и альтернативные версии оригинальных карт, где легко можно найти два самых мощных оружия в игре, а также кучу боеприпасов для них. DMC Pro характеризуется чрезвычайно быстрым действием, где ракетница почти всегда единственное используемое оружие. вот ссылка на скачивание модификации DMC Pro: https://gamebanana.com/mods/37743
